archimate:Node.name: [SBB] Fortinet FortiAnalyzer
archimate:Node.documentation:
The FortiAnalyzer feature set can be enabled in FortiManager. The FortiAnalyzer feature set includes the following modules: - FortiView (FortiView & Log View) - Event Management - Reports
De firewall omgeving bestaat uit drie onderdelen te bestaan uit Firewalling (Fortigateâ€™s), Management (FortiManager) & Monitoring and Analysis (FortiAnalyzer).
